definition: to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to

sentences.english: Because of your temple at Jerusalem kings will bring you gifts.
sentences.chinese: 因你耶路撒冷的殿，列王必带贡物献给你。

sentences.english: Graphics on screen The Kingdom will return to Jerusalem and It will be ruled over by a marvellous King.
sentences.chinese: 神的国将回到耶路撒冷，由一位了不起的王作统治。

sentences.english: In 638 the Moslems had captured Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 公元638年穆斯林人占领了耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: The words of the Preacher, the son of David, king in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 在耶路撒冷作王，大卫的儿子，传道者的言语。

sentences.english: Jehoram was thirty-two years old when he became king, and he reigned in Jerusalem eight years.
sentences.chinese: 约兰登基的时候年三十二岁，在耶路撒冷作王八年。

sentences.english: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他夺了哈大利谢臣仆所拿的金盾牌带到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: Thirty and two years old was he when he began to reign; and he reigned eight years in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 约兰登基的时候年三十二岁，在耶路撒冷作王八年。

sentences.english: And he answered me, These are the horns which have scattered Judah, Israel, and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他回答说，这是打散犹大，以色列，和耶路撒冷的角。

sentences.english: He was twenty-five years old when he became king, and he reigned in Jerusalem twenty-nine years.
sentences.chinese: 他登基的时候年二十五岁，在耶路撒冷作王二十九年。

sentences.english: In distant Jerusalem, wicked Herod was still king.
sentences.chinese: 在遥远的耶路撒冷，缺德的希律王仍然是国王。

sentences.english: Joachaz was three and twenty years old when he began to reign, and he reigned three months in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 约阿哈次登极时二十三岁，在耶路撒冷为王三个月。

sentences.english: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他夺了哈大底谢臣仆所拿的金盾牌，带到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: And his parents went every year to Jerusalem, at the solemn day of the pasch.
sentences.chinese: 他的父母每年逾越节往耶路撒冷去。

sentences.english: And Jehoshaphat the king of Judah returned to his house in peace to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 犹大王约沙法平平安安地回耶路撒冷，到宫里去了。

sentences.english: 27During this time some prophets came down from Jerusalem to Antioch.
sentences.chinese: 当那些日子，有几位先知从耶路撒冷下到安提阿。

sentences.english: He and his son wander through the Old City of Jerusalem, snapping photos as they go.
sentences.chinese: 他和儿子在耶路撒冷老城中漫步，一边走一边拍照。

pinyin: You2 tai4 fu4 guo2 zhu3 yi4

definition: the Six-Day War of June 1967 between Israel and its Arab neighbors
Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
